questiontext.text:

\(A=\left(\begin{array}{rrr} 1 & 4 & -2 \\ 4 & 18 & -8 \\ -2 & -8 & 12 \end{array}\right)\)

Jos Silvestro determinantai

\(\text{det } M_1 = \text{det} \left(\begin{array}{r} 1 \end{array}\right) = 1, \qquad \text{det } M_2 = \text{det} \left(\begin{array}{rr} 1 & 4 \\ 4 & 18 \end{array}\right) = 2, \qquad \text{det } M_3 = \text{det} \left(\begin{array}{rrr} 1 & 4 & -2 \\ 4 & 18 & -8 \\ -2 & -8 & 12 \end{array}\right) = 16\).

Remiantis Silvestro kriterijumi, kvadratinė forma \(f(x_1,x_2,x_3)\) yra teigiamai apibrėžta.
